languages.text: Тело сенешаля династии Винтерскейл обглодано дикими животными, но следы на позвоночнике и расколотом черепе указывают на то, что мужчину разрубили пополам силовым оружием.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] кто-то яростно порубил сенешаля винтерскейла огромным топором, похоже, сам винтерскейл

languages.text: The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been picked clean by wild beasts, but the marks on his spine and his split skull suggest that the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.
languages.original_text: Тело сенешаля династии Винтерскейл обглодано дикими животными, но следы на позвоночнике и расколотом черепе указывают на то, что мужчину разрубили пополам силовым оружием.

traits.locale_text: The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been gnawed at by wild beasts, but marks on his spine and split skull suggest the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.
The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been gnawed at by wild beasts, but marks on his spine and split skull suggest the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.

The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been picked clean by wild beasts, but the marks on his spine and his split skull suggest that the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.
The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been picked clean by wild beasts, but the marks on his spine and his split skull suggest that the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.

languages.text: 温特斯凯尔家族总领的遗骨已经被野兽啃得干干净净，但他脊椎上切痕与头骨上的裂痕表明，他是被一把能量武器猛力劈成了两半。
languages.original_text: The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been picked clean by wild beasts, but the marks on his spine and his split skull suggest that the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.

traits.locale_text: 温特斯凯尔家族总领的尸体遭到了野兽的啃噬，但他脊椎上切痕与头骨上的裂痕表明，他是被一把能量武器猛力劈成了两半。

languages.text: Die Leiche des Truchsesses von Haus Winterzunder wurde von wilden Tieren zerfressen, seine Knochen abgenagt. Spuren an seinem Rückgrat und sein zertrümmerter Schädel lassen jedoch darauf schließen, dass der Mann mit einer Energiewaffe in zwei Hälften gespalten wurde.
languages.original_text: The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been picked clean by wild beasts, but the marks on his spine and his split skull suggest that the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.

traits.locale_text: Die Leiche des Truchsesses von Haus Winterzunder wurde von wilden Tieren zerfressen, seine Knochen abgenagt. Spuren an seinem Rückgrat und gespaltenen Schädel lassen jedoch darauf schließen, dass der Mann mit einer Energiewaffe in zwei Hälften gespaltenen wurde.

languages.text: El cuerpo del senescal de la casa Winterscale ha sido devorado por las bestias salvajes, pero a juzgar por las marcas que tiene en el espinazo y en su cráneo hendido, el hombre murió partido en dos con un arma de energía.
languages.original_text: The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been picked clean by wild beasts, but the marks on his spine and his split skull suggest that the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.

traits.locale_text: El cuerpo del senescal de la casa Winterscale ha sido devorado parcialmente por las bestias salvajes, pero a juzgar por las marcas que tiene en el espinazo y en su cráneo hendido, el hombre murió partido en dos con un arma de energía.

languages.text: Le corps du sénéchal de la maison Winterscale a été mutilé par des bêtes sauvages, mais les marques au niveau de sa colonne vertébrale et de son crâne indiquent qu'il a été coupé en deux par une arme énergétique.
languages.original_text: The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been picked clean by wild beasts, but the marks on his spine and his split skull suggest that the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.

traits.locale_text: Le corps du sénéchal de la maison Winterscale a été mutilé par des bêtes sauvages, mais les marques au niveau de sa colonne vertébrale et de son crâne indiquent qu'il a été coupé en deux par une arme énergétique.

languages.text: ウィンタースケール家の家令長の遺体は野獣にほじくられているが、背骨の跡と頭蓋骨が割れていることから、パワーウェポンで真っ二つに切り裂かれたものと思われる。
languages.original_text: The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been picked clean by wild beasts, but the marks on his spine and his split skull suggest that the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.

traits.locale_text: ウィンタースケール家の家令長の遺体は野獣にほじくられているが、背骨の跡と頭蓋骨が割れていることから、パワーウェポンで真っ二つに切り裂かれたものと思われる。

languages.text: Winterscale Hanesi Seneşali'nin cesedi, yabani yaratıklar tarafından silinip süpürülmüş. Belkemiğindeki izler ve yarılan kafatası ise adamın bir güç silahıyla ikiye ayrıldığını gösteriyor.
languages.original_text: The body of House Winterscale's Seneschal has been picked clean by wild beasts, but the marks on his spine and his split skull suggest that the man was sliced in two with a power weapon.

traits.locale_text: Winterscale Hanesi Seneşalı'nın cesedi, yabani yaratıklar tarafından silinip süpürülmüş ancak belkemiğindeki izler ve yarılan kafatası, adamın bir güç silahıyla ikiye ayrıldığını gösteriyor.
